docs.title: DevRel.ai
docs.text: Welcome to DevRel.ai, where we explore the intersection of developer relations and artificial intelligence.

docs.title: About Us
docs.text: DevRel.ai is dedicated to helping companies build better relationships with developers through the intelligent use of AI. We provide resources, insights, and tools for modern developer advocacy.

docs.title: Key Focus Areas
docs.text:
• AI-Enhanced Documentation - Creating more intuitive, contextual documentation experiences
  • Intelligent Community Engagement - Using AI to better understand and serve developer communities
  • Developer Experience Analytics - Measuring and optimizing the developer journey
  • Content Personalization - Delivering the right content to the right developer at the right time

docs.title: Get Started
docs.text: Browse our documentation to learn how AI is transforming developer relations and how you can leverage these tools for your organization.
